# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is truly a testament to our dedication to excellence and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its superior features and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at a special price of $150. This is a limited-time opportunity, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-notch product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
